contents.text: Welcome to Carrot Fertility, your inclusive partner in employee reproductive health benefits.
If you’re an employer looking to customize your company’s fertility benefits, press 1.
To learn more about designing a tailored fertility plan for your workforce, press 1.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you to our employer solutions team.

navigationGoals: I need to customize a fertility benefits plan for my company's employees.
As a veteran business owner, I’d like to design a tailored fertility benefits plan for my employees.
I want to integrate and configure a custom fertility benefits module in our HRIS with Carrot’s employer solutions team.
I need to speak with someone about customizing fertility benefits for my company's workforce.
I’d like to explore customizing fertility benefits for my company’s workforce.

contents.text: To get information on pricing, enrollment process, and implementation timelines, press 2.
One moment please. A pricing and enrollment specialist will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: I need pricing and enrollment details, plus an implementation timeline for our fertility benefits.
As a veteran-run company, I need details on pricing, enrollment, and implementation timelines for our fertility benefits.
I need detailed pricing tiers, enrollment workflow specifications, and projected go-live timelines for implementing Carrot Fertility benefits.
I need pricing details and enrollment steps for our company's fertility benefits plan.
I need details on pricing, enrollment procedures, and implementation timelines for our fertility benefits plan.

contents.text: If you’re an employee seeking support with your fertility benefits, press 2.
To schedule a fertility consultation with a care coordinator, press 1.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you to a fertility care coordinator.

navigationGoals: I need to schedule a fertility consultation with a care coordinator.
As an ex-military veteran, I want to book a fertility consultation with a care coordinator.
I’d like to schedule a telehealth fertility consultation with a care coordinator and sync it to my calendar.
I want to set up a fertility consultation appointment with a care coordinator.
I want to schedule a fertility consultation with a care coordinator under my employer’s plan.

contents.text: For general support, benefits FAQs, or account questions, press 2.
One moment please. A support representative will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: I need help with general questions about my fertility benefits and my account.
As an ex-service member, I need help understanding my fertility benefits and have general account questions.
I need to troubleshoot my benefits portal access, review my coverage entitlements in the online dashboard, and reset my account credentials.
I need assistance understanding my fertility benefits and have some general account questions.
I need general support with my fertility benefits, like FAQs and account questions.
